src:
Eliteseriens toppscorer herjet - n√•dde imponerende milep√¶l
Odd snudde til seier mot Mj√∏ndalen og har godt grep om medalje.
04 Nov 2019, 20:00 by NTB

ODDS - MJ√òNDALEN 3‚Äì2

Torgeir B√∏rven (27) scoret to av m√•lene da Odd vant 3-2 hjemme mot Mj√∏ndalen i Eliteserien mandag kveld.

Han er ligaens toppscorer med 20 m√•l denne sesongen. Sist en spiller scoret over 20 m√•l i eliteserien var tilbake i 2015, da Rosenborg-spiss Alexander S√∏derlund laget 22.

‚Äì Det var smakte godt med tre poeng etter et par nedturer underveis. Vi klarte √• snu kampen. Dette var meget viktig med tanke p√• √• ta en medalje, sa B√∏rven til Eurosport.
B√∏rven hadde scoret to allerede da seiersm√•let kom seks minutter f√∏r full tid. Det kunne se ut som det var B√∏rven som var sist p√• ballen da matchvinnerscoringen kom ogs√•, men det var Mj√∏ndalen-keeper Julian Faye Lund (p√• utl√•n fra Rosenborg) som til slutt ble kreditert et selvm√•l i det som ble en innholdsrik og underholdende fotballkamp.

NFFs cupregler f√•r eliteserietrener til √• rase: ‚Äì Helt idiotisk!

Seiersm√•let kom bare seks minutter etter at nevnte B√∏rven hadde redusert til 2-2 p√• straffespark. B√∏rven hadde ogs√• utlignet til 1-1 rett f√∏r pause.

Odd var det beste laget p√• hjemmebane, og de hadde muligheten til √• klatre opp i ryggen p√• s√∏lvplasserte Bod√∏/Glimt med seier. Det klarte de. Med tre serierunder igjen er de bare to poeng bak Glimt, mens det er fire poeng ned til Rosenborg p√• 4.-plass og seks poeng til Viking p√• plassen bak tr√∏nderne.

Nedrykkstruede Mj√∏ndalen tok ledelsen to ganger, men det holdt ikke for de brune. Dermed er de fortsatt nest sist p√• tabellen med samme poengsum som bunnlaget Ranheim med tre kamper igjen √• spille. Mj√∏ndalen og Ranheim m√∏tes i neste serierunde.
Opp til Str√∏msgodset p√• kvalifiseringsplassen er det to poeng. Opp til Troms√∏ p√• trygg grunn er det fire poeng.

‚Äì Denne typen tap er ekstremt bittert. Vi ledet jo til det sto igjen 11-12 minutter. Vi har ikke f√•tt noe gratis denne sesongen. Det var ikke marginer v√•r vei denne gangen heller, sa Mj√∏ndalens trener Vegard Hansen.



Her setter Brochmann inn 1‚Äì0 for gjestene.üì∑ Trond Reidar Teigen / NTB scanpix

Rett i tet
Mj√∏ndalens f√∏rste scoring kom rett f√∏r det var spilt 24 minutter. Odd-forsvaret og keeper Sondre Rossbach kl√∏net det skikkelig til, og Odds venstreback Birk Risa endte opp med √• sende en krempasning rett i f√∏ttene p√• Mj√∏ndalens Tonny Brochmann. Den 30-√•rige dansken kunne sette ballen h√∏yt i det √•pne buret etter den reneste gavepakken fra hjemmelaget.
Mj√∏ndalen kj√∏rte kampen helt i de f√∏rste minuttene etter scoringen. F√∏r scoringen virket det som om Odd hadde kampen der de ville ha den. Mj√∏ndalen kunne fort ha scoret ett m√•l til i de f√∏rste 45 minuttene. Joackim Olsen Solberg var n√¶r scoring √•tte minutter f√∏r pause.

I stedet var det Odd som nettet fortjent, og det gjorde de ved Eliteseriens suverene toppscorer. Torgeir B√∏rven dukket opp p√• bakerste stolpe etter en corner og headet inn sin 19. scoring til 1-1 i det 45. minutt.

B√∏rven var tilbake etter karantene og viste hvilken m√•lgeit han har v√¶rt denne sesongen.

Tribunekaoset i Eliteserien: To supportere behandlet for brannskader



Frustrert: Mj√∏ndalen-kaptein Christian Gauseth.üì∑ Trond Reidar Teigen / NTB scanpix

Mye ball
Odd hadde ballen mye f√∏r pause, men ofte var innleggene av d√•rlig kvalitet og det var greit at det ebbet ut med 1-1 etter 1. omgang.
Odd var det beste laget etter pause, men det var Mj√∏ndalen som scoret f√∏rst.
Etter 72 spilte minutter satt den igjen for Mj√∏ndalen. Flere spillere var involvert da ballen etter hvert dalte ned hos Vetle Dragsnes, og 25-√•ringen scoret sitt andre for sesongen.

12 minutter gjensto da Odd utlignet til 2-2. Torgeir B√∏rven ble revet over ende innenfor 16-meteren og dommer Trygve Kjensli d√∏mte straffe. Odd scoret i det samme angrepet uten at det ble tatt hensyn til.

Uansett var B√∏rven sikker fra krittmerke og satte ballen nede ved stolperoten til h√∏yre for Mj√∏ndalens keeper Julian Faye Lund.

Og da 3-2-scoringen kom noen minutter senere var det gjort. Poengene ble igjen hos Odd.

(¬©NTB)
text:
Elite series top scorer ravaged - reaching impressive milestone
Odd turned to victory against Mj√∏ndalen and has a good grip on the medal.
04 Nov 2019, 20:00 at NTB

ODDS - MJ√òNDALEN 3‚Äì2

Torgeir B√∏rven (27) scored two goals when Odd won 3-2 at home against Mj√∏ndalen in the Elite Series on Monday night.

He is the league's top scorer with 20 goals this season. The last player to score over 20 goals in the elite series was back in 2015, when Rosenborg striker Alexander S√∏derlund made 22.

- It tasted good with three points after a couple of downs along the way. We managed to turn the game around. This was very important in terms of taking a medal, B√∏rven told Eurosport.
B√∏rven had scored two already when the victory goal came six minutes before full time. It might look like B√∏rven was the last on the ball when the match winner's score came, but it was Mj√∏ndalen keeper Julian Faye Lund (on loan from Rosenborg) who was eventually credited with a self-made goal in what became a contentious and entertaining football game.

NFF's cup rules cause elite coaches to rage: - Absolutely idiotic!

The victory goal came just six minutes after the aforementioned B√∏rven had reduced to 2-2 at the penalty spot. B√∏rven had also equaled 1-1 just before the break.

Odd was the best team at home, and they had the opportunity to climb the back of silver-placed Bod√∏ / Glimt with victory. They did. With three series rounds left, they are only two points behind Glimt, while there are four points down to Rosenborg in fourth place and six points to Viking in the space behind the Trunders.

Downtrodden Mj√∏ndalen took the lead twice, but it did not hold for the Browns. Thus, they are still second to last on the table with the same score as the bottom team Ranheim with three games left to play. Mj√∏ndalen and Ranheim meet in the next series round.
Up to Str√∏msgodset in the qualifying place there are two points. Up to Troms√∏ on safe ground there are four points.

- This type of loss is extremely bitter. After all, we headed for 11-12 minutes. We haven't received anything for free this season. There were no margins our way this time either, said Mj√∏ndalen coach Vegard Hansen.



Here, Brochmann inserts 1‚Äì0 for the guests.üì∑ Trond Reidar Teigen / NTB scanpix

Right in the head
Mj√∏ndalen's first score came just before it was played 24 minutes. Odd defender and keeper Sondre Rossbach really scratched it, and Odds left-back Birk Risa ended up sending a cream pass right into the feet of Mj√∏ndalen's Tonny Brochmann. The 30-year-old could put the ball high in the open cage for the cleanest gift package from the home team.
Mj√∏ndalen ran the game all the way in the first minutes after scoring. Before the score, it seemed as if Odd had the match where they wanted it. Mj√∏ndalen could easily have scored one more goal in the first 45 minutes. Joackim Olsen Solberg was close to scoring eight minutes before the break.

Instead, it was Odd who deserved the net, and they did so by the elite elite scorers. Torgeir B√∏rven appeared on the back post after a corner and headed his 19th score to 1-1 in the 45th minute.

B√∏rven was back after the quarantine and showed what a goat he has been this season.

Tribune chaos in the Elite Series: Two supporters treated for burns



Frustrated: Mj√∏ndalen captain Christian Gauseth.üì∑ Trond Reidar Teigen / NTB scanpix

A lot of ball
Odd had the ball a lot before the break, but often the posts were poor quality and it was okay that it ebbed out with 1-1 after the first half.
Odd was the best team after the break, but it was Mj√∏ndalen who scored first.
After 72 minutes played it left for Mj√∏ndalen. Several players were involved as the ball eventually dropped at Vetle Dragsnes, and the 25-year-old scored his second for the season.

12 minutes remained when Odd equalized to 2-2. Torgeir B√∏rven was demolished within 16 meters and Judge Trygve Kjensli sentenced the penalty. Odd scored in the same attack without being taken into account.

In any case, B√∏rven was safe from the chalk mark and put the ball down at the bar to the right of Mj√∏ndalen keeper Julian Faye Lund.

And when the 3-2 score came minutes later it was done. The points remained with Odd.

(¬© NTB)
